description:
CodeTime is a minimalist and stylish interactive wallpaper for Wallpaper Engine that transforms your workspace into a digital developer environment. The clock is designed as a code snippet, displaying the current date, day of the week, time, and daily progress percentage.

It features animated clock hands and real-time data updates, creating the effect of a live programming interface. Perfect for developers, programmers, and tech enthusiasts!

Features:
✅ Minimalist design with a coding aesthetic
✅ Live clock styled as a JavaScript object
✅ Animated clock hands and smooth transitions
✅ Supports both 12-hour and 24-hour formats
✅ Lightweight and non-intrusive interface

You can check out my other works here:
https://steamcommunity.com/id/timaskg/myworkshopfiles/
title: CodeTime
